title: Vehicle sales in the United States 2019
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Vehicles, and Vehicle retail sales in thousands in each Vehicles on the y axis.
The maximum Vehicle retail sales in thousands 17494.6 is found at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and the minimum is found at Heavy trucks where Vehicles is 529.5.
The lowest value at Vehicles Heavy trucks is 33.04x times less than the highest value at Motor vehicles (total).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Vehicle retail sales in thousands for 5 number of Vehicless.
The Vehicle retail sales in thousands is highest at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and lowest at Vehicles Heavy trucks.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Vehicles, and Vehicle retail sales in thousands in each Vehicles on the y axis.
The maximum Vehicle retail sales in thousands 17494.6 is found at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and the minimum is found at Heavy trucks where Vehicles is 529.5.
The lowest value at Vehicles Heavy trucks is 33.04x times less than the highest value at Motor vehicles (total).
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Vehicles in the x axis and Vehicle retail sales in thousands in the y axis.
The Vehicle retail sales in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) and lowest at Vehicles Heavy trucks.
The second highest Vehicle retail sales in thousands is appeared to be the Vehicles Light vehicles (total).
The minimum Vehicles Heavy trucks has got 33.04 times less Vehicle retail sales in thousands than the maximum Vehicles Motor vehicles (total).
Vehicle retail sales in thousands at Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) is 17494.6 , second place is Light vehicles (total) at 16965.2, and thirdly is Thereof light trucks at 12237.8.
The Vehicles Motor vehicles (total) has 1.68 times more Vehicle retail sales in thousands than average.
The Vehicle retail sales in thousands is 51954.4 if we add up values of all Vehicless.
